title: hmm i cant figure this font out!
content:
The font used in Wai Wai, anyone knows what it is?  
Thank you!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820135419im_/http:/typophile.com/files/waiwai_5654.jpg)
author: tonestray

comments.content: Calibri seems to be it! So fantastic to get help like this! love it. Thank you!
